snippet: A mural by the elusive British graffiti artist known as Banksy was removed in Clacton-on-Sea, a small town in England, after the local council received a complaint that it was “offensive” and “racist.”
abstract: A mural by the elusive British graffiti artist known as Banksy was removed in Clacton-on-Sea, a small town in England, after the local council received a complaint that it was “offensive” and “racist.”

headline.main: Banksy Immigration Mural Is Taken Down
